DOC.brief_summary: The study conduct explore safety tolerability CoVaccine HT healthy male female volunteer . In study volunteer receive intramuscular injection CoVaccine HT .
DOC.brief_title: Open-label Safety Tolerability Study CoVaccine HTâ„¢ Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Adult male female non childbearing potential age 25 65 year inclusive 19 35 kg/m2 body mass index ( BMI ) Generally healthy determine pre study medical history , physical examination , 12 lead ECG . Negative hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , hepatitis C antibody human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) I II test screen rapid influenza diagnostic test admission . History alcohol abuse last 5 year drug abuse time , current significant alcohol consumption . Fever , active infection ( influenza ) acute gastrointestinal symptom follow prior first dose Subjects previous serious reaction vaccine , angioedema anaphylaxis
